comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: wow, this lady looks a lot like my good friend Isabel: www.flickr.com/photos/bigbean/2610686749/in/set-721576058... -- Seen in your Southworth & Hawes set. (?)

comment.author: 33902128@N07
comment._content: So strange to look at these unidentified people and realize they were once a part of this world. Loved and now forgotten. Stranger still to realize years from now our own photographs could be of an unidentified man or woman.
